content:
As an AI language model, I'm not aware of any detailed or specific plans beyond what has been shared by the Lambeth Council website. However, Lambeth Council has an ongoing commitment to promoting sustainable transportation options within the borough. The council's 'Transport Local Implementation Plan (LIP) 3' sets out a long-term transport vision for the borough, focusing on initiatives to improve air quality, create safer streets, and enhance sustainable transport. Initiatives include more cycle infrastructure and walking routes, measures to reduce car use, and improvements to public transport, among others.

The council also engages with residents and stakeholders regularly to gather feedback and suggestions for future initiatives. You can check the Lambeth Council website or social media accounts for updates on their latest initiatives and plans.
